title: Private land owner or developer appointed by him or any Company with legal entity may apply for permission for Integrated Logistic Park
clause_text: Private land owner or developer appointed by him or any Company with legal entity may apply for permission for Integrated Logistic Park. A logistic Park can include the following activities. (The list is indicative) Sorting, grading, packaging/ repackaging, tagging/ labelling.
section: Eligibility for establishment of Logistic Park

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Private land owner or developer appointed by him or any Company with legal entity may apply for permission for Integrated Logistic Park.
